name: anclb

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wa(w0, w1)))

comment: Conjoin antecedent to left of consequent. Theorem *4.7 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1999.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Mar-2013.)
